original: @250b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @250b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: si ha n'a da lo ke shra ra bha tt'a ra ka sya stu ti /
analyzed: si ha n'a da lo ke shra ra bha tt'a ra ka sya stu ti /
translated: Sihanada Lokeshvara Bhattaraka Stuti

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la bstod pa /
analyzed: rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la bstod pa /
translated: Praise to the Noble Lord of the World, Lion's Roar

original: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Lord of the World!

original: srid pa'i gnas ni grangs bral bgrang 'dod 'dir khyod la //
analyzed: srid pa'i gnas ni grangs bral bgrang 'dod 'dir khyod la //
translated: Here, wishing to count the countless abodes of existence,

original: 'ong  ldan snyan ngag mkhan po ches cher dga' ba'i gtam //
analyzed: 'ong  ldan snyan ngag mkhan po ches cher dga' ba'i gtam //
translated: The very joyful speech of the great poet Samantabhadra,

original: yon tan tshogs brjod de ltar bdag ni blo ngan yang //
analyzed: yon tan tshogs brjod de ltar bdag ni blo ngan yang //
translated: Thus, although I am of poor intellect,

original: 'gro ba gnyis su mngon bstod sar pa'i tshig dag 'god //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyis su mngon bstod sar pa'i tshig dag 'god //
translated: I set forth the words of Saraha, praised by both migrating beings and sages.

original: rgya chen srid pa'i pha rol byang chub ston mdzad pa //
analyzed: rgya chen srid pa'i pha rol byang chub ston mdzad pa //
translated: The one who shows enlightenment, the far shore of vast existence,

original: dus ring thang gcig bzhin du byas te brtse bas sku bzung nas //
analyzed: dus ring thang gcig bzhin du byas te brtse bas sku bzung nas //
translated: Having taken a compassionate form, as if a long time were an instant,

original: sems can gnas pa ma lus kun mkhyen de nyid la 'god mdzad //
analyzed: sems can gnas pa ma lus kun mkhyen de nyid la 'god mdzad //
translated: Establishes all beings without exception in that very omniscience.

original: 'gro ba'i mgon po brtse ldan seng ge'i sgra de rgyal gyur cig / gang tshe ri bong mtshan ma mkha' la 'od dang 'gro ba mtshon //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mgon po brtse ldan seng ge'i sgra de rgyal gyur cig / gang tshe ri bong mtshan ma mkha' la 'od dang 'gro ba mtshon //
translated: When the moon's mark, light, and movement are reflected in the sky,

original: gang gang chos mkhas sgrub byed bi shva karma bzhin //
analyzed: gang gang chos mkhas sgrub byed bi shva karma bzhin //
translated: Whatever is practiced by the wise in the Dharma is like Vishvakarma's work.

original: ma lus dkar ba'i snying po nyams dga'i dngos mdzad pa //
analyzed: ma lus dkar ba'i snying po nyams dga'i dngos mdzad pa //
translated: The one who acts with delight in the essence of all that is pure,üîΩThat Lion's Roar, radiating light, is victorious!

original: de yang seng ge'i sgra ste 'od zer 'phro zhing rgyal gyur cig / dbu la rin chen 'bar ba 'bad pas gnas par mdzad pas ci //
analyzed: de yang seng ge'i sgra ste 'od zer 'phro zhing rgyal gyur cig / dbu la rin chen 'bar ba 'bad pas gnas par mdzad pas ci //
translated: Why make an effort to place a blazing jewel on your head?

original: legs byas rang bzhin sgron me 'di ni nyer 'dzin mdzad pa lags //
analyzed: legs byas rang bzhin sgron me 'di ni nyer 'dzin mdzad pa lags //
translated: This lamp of good deeds is already held by you.

original: de ltar gang zhig lag 'gro lta bu'i the tsom bdud ni 'joms //
analyzed: de ltar gang zhig lag 'gro lta bu'i the tsom bdud ni 'joms //
translated: Thus, the one who conquers the demon of doubt, like the demon of the rakshasas,

original: pha rol rgol las rnam rgyal seng ge'i sgra des khyed la srungs //
analyzed: pha rol rgol las rnam rgyal seng ge'i sgra des khyed la srungs //
translated: May that Lion's Roar, victorious over opponents, protect you!

original: 'gro ba gsum gyi sa la mkhas shing bdud kyi phyogs ni 'joms //
analyzed: 'gro ba gsum gyi sa la mkhas shing bdud kyi phyogs ni 'joms //
translated: Skilled in the three worlds, conquering the forces of Mara,

original: lag 'gro'i bdag por gnas pa'i nad ni 'joms shing bzhugs //
analyzed: lag 'gro'i bdag por gnas pa'i nad ni 'joms shing bzhugs //
translated: Dwelling to conquer the disease of the lord of the rakshasas,

original: gang gi rtse gsum dmyal bar 'gro ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa ste //
analyzed: gang gi rtse gsum dmyal bar 'gro ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa ste //
translated: The root of the destruction of the three lower realms,

original: mchog ldan re nu'i sras po seng ge sgra la phyag @251a * //
analyzed: mchog ldan re nu'i sras po seng ge sgra la phyag @251a * //
translated: Homage to the son of ≈örƒ´gupta, Hari,

original: 'tshal lo // phul byung dkar ba'i rab lta bu yi shel gyi bgrang phreng yang //
analyzed: 'tshal lo // phul byung dkar ba'i rab lta bu yi shel gyi bgrang phreng yang //
translated: The crystal rosary, like a white lotus,

original: dge ba mdzad pa'i phyag tu thogs pas gshin rje yang dag gnon //
analyzed: dge ba mdzad pa'i phyag tu thogs pas gshin rje yang dag gnon //
translated: Is held in the hand of the one who does good, and he conquers Yama.

original: rab tu mdzes pa nor bu'i rol pa brtse dang tshul khrims ldan //
analyzed: rab tu mdzes pa nor bu'i rol pa brtse dang tshul khrims ldan //
translated: The beautiful jewel play, endowed with compassion and morality,üîΩMay the one with eyes of joy, the lion's roar, protect you all.

original: dges pa'i spyan ldan seng ge'i sgra des khyed la srung gyur cig / snying la 'bab pa'i gang gi ral pa mdzes pa'i zer 'di ni //
analyzed: dges pa'i spyan ldan seng ge'i sgra des khyed la srung gyur cig / snying la 'bab pa'i gang gi ral pa mdzes pa'i zer 'di ni //
translated: This beautiful light of his mane, which falls on the heart,

original: 'bar zhing g-yo ba sa 'dzin lag 'gro lhag ma la ni nyal //
analyzed: 'bar zhing g-yo ba sa 'dzin lag 'gro lhag ma la ni nyal //
translated: Blazing and moving, lies on the remaining serpent-like mountain.

original: 'od gsal mkhar rol 'o ma'i rgya mtshor aindra n'i la bzhin //
analyzed: 'od gsal mkhar rol 'o ma'i rgya mtshor aindra n'i la bzhin //
translated: In the sky of clear light, in the ocean of milk, like an emerald,üîΩMay the lion's roar show you all that is auspicious.

original: seng ge'i sgra des khyed la shis pa mtha' dag ston gyur cig /'gro ba rnam par phongs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'i rkyen gang yin //
analyzed: seng ge'i sgra des khyed la shis pa mtha' dag ston gyur cig /'gro ba rnam par phongs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'i rkyen gang yin //
translated: Whatever conditions there are for the means of the poverty of beings,

original: bdud bcu po rnams ral gri'i so yis zhi mdzad pa //
analyzed: bdud bcu po rnams ral gri'i so yis zhi mdzad pa //
translated: The one who has pacified the ten maras with the edge of his sword,

original: srid pa gsum gyis zhabs la btud pa seng ge'i sgra de yis //
analyzed: srid pa gsum gyis zhabs la btud pa seng ge'i sgra de yis //
translated: The one who is bowed to by the three worlds, that Lion's Roar,üîΩMay he destroy and remove the sickness and harm of beings.

original: de ni 'gro ba'i nad dang nyer 'tshe 'joms shing sel gyur cig / ri dags bdag po yang ni dpal ldan lha rigs skyabs 'os te //
analyzed: de ni 'gro ba'i nad dang nyer 'tshe 'joms shing sel gyur cig / ri dags bdag po yang ni dpal ldan lha rigs skyabs 'os te //
translated: The lord of beasts is also glorious, worthy of being the refuge of the divine race,

original: bde gshegs theg pa rig mngon pa yi nga rgyal kun las grol //
analyzed: bde gshegs theg pa rig mngon pa yi nga rgyal kun las grol //
translated: The Sugata, the one with manifest knowledge of the vehicle, liberated from all pride,

original: bde gshegs phrin las rnam rgyas gang gi sku la 'dzin mdzad pa //
analyzed: bde gshegs phrin las rnam rgyas gang gi sku la 'dzin mdzad pa //
translated: The Sugata whose body is filled with the vast activity of the Buddha,üîΩMay that Lion's Roar accomplish your desired aims.

original: seng ge'i sgra des khyed kyi mngon par 'dod don sgrub gyur cig / de ltar bdag gis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs ni yongs su brjod pa las //
analyzed: seng ge'i sgra des khyed kyi mngon par 'dod don sgrub gyur cig / de ltar bdag gis khyod kyi yon tan tshogs ni yongs su brjod pa las //
translated: In this way, I have fully expressed your assembly of qualities,

original: zhi ba'i rang bzhin dge ba'i 'bras bu bsags pa'i tshogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: zhi ba'i rang bzhin dge ba'i 'bras bu bsags pa'i tshogs rnams kyis //
translated: With the accumulation of virtuous fruits of a peaceful nature,

original: ma lus 'gro ba 'di dag dga' ba'i bdag po'i lag tu ma lhung zhing //
analyzed: ma lus 'gro ba 'di dag dga' ba'i bdag po'i lag tu ma lhung zhing //
translated: May all beings not fall into the hands of the lord of joy,

original: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la kun nas rab tu 'jug gyur cig / mgon po 'di yi gzugs kyi rang bzhin sku ni kun nas thob gyur te //
analyzed: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs la kun nas rab tu 'jug gyur cig / mgon po 'di yi gzugs kyi rang bzhin sku ni kun nas thob gyur te //
translated: May I attain the form of this protector's body.üîΩMay I become a guide for all beings without exception.

original: ma lus 'gro ba ji snyed 'di ni rnam par 'dren pa nyid gyur cig / kun nas gtsang mar byas pa skye bo'i bzhin gyi me long 'di //
analyzed: ma lus 'gro ba ji snyed 'di ni rnam par 'dren pa nyid gyur cig / kun nas gtsang mar byas pa skye bo'i bzhin gyi me long 'di //
translated: This mirror of the people's faces, made completely pure,

original: dpal thob ldan pa snyan ngag mkhan gyi bdag po gnyis skyes srung bas byas /
analyzed: dpal thob ldan pa snyan ngag mkhan gyi bdag po gnyis skyes srung bas byas /
translated: was created by the poet-lord ≈örƒ´dhara, the protector of the twice-born.

original: rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge'i sgra la bstod pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge'i sgra la bstod pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise of the exalted Avalokite≈õvara, the Lion's Roar, is completed.

original: // / dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rgyal ba spyan snga rin po che'i bka' bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong dharmma p'a la bha dras bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rgyal ba spyan snga rin po che'i bka' bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong dharmma p'a la bha dras bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the Zhalu translator, the monk DharmapƒÅla Bhadra, according to the words of the glorious and excellent guru, the conqueror's regent Rinpoche.
